events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster after reviewing the customer's message regarding wrong product delivery.
The case has been assigned to the refund processing team for further assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order and I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 789654123 and I have attached photos showing the product received does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We have approved your refund request and you should expect the amount credited back to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for resolving this quickly! I appreciate your prompt support and look forward to getting the refund soon.
The refund case has been marked as resolved with the refund process initiated successfully.
We just wanted to follow up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
